price: (51) A speaker among them will say, "Indeed, I had a companion [on earth].
arabic: قَالَ قَآئِلٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ إِنِّي كَانَ لِي قَرِينٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qāla qāilun min'hum innī kāna lī qarīnun
